scripts.tag: concurrently "npm run tag:load-balancer" "npm tun tag:api" "npm tun tag:headless" "npm tun tag:admin" "npm tun tag:marketing" "npm tun tag:storefront" "npm tun tag:channel" "npm tun tag:forum"
scripts.tag:load-balancer: cd istrav-load-balancer && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:api: cd istrav-api && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:headless: cd istrav-headless && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:admin: cd istrav-admin && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:marketing: cd istrav-marketing && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:storefront: cd istrav-storefront && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:channel: cd istrav-channel && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
scripts.tag:forum: cd istrav-forum && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags
